key_risks: Supply chain disruptions impacting inventory and profitability
Economic sensitivity to housing market fluctuations
Intense competition from traditional retailers and e-commerce giants
controversies: Modern slavery and labor violations in the supply chain
Legal disputes, such as the case with the Commissioners of Customs and Excise
environmental_issues: Environmental impact concerns, particularly in waste management and material sourcing
social_issues: Modern slavery and labor practices in the supply chain
Effectiveness of HR practices in addressing ethical concerns
governance_issues: Scrutiny over adherence to ethical standards in the supply chain
